com.jswiff.listeners
Class SWFDocumentReader

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.listeners.SWFListener
      com.jswiff.listeners.SWFDocumentReader
public class SWFDocumentReader
extends SWFListener

Simple implementation of an SWFListener, can be used to create a SWFDocument. During file parsing, the header and the tags are stored in this document and some properties (e.g. background color, metadata, access mode) are set. Usage: 

 
 SWFReader reader            = new SWFReader(inputStream);
 SWFDocumentReader docReader = new SWFDocumentReader();
 reader.addListener(docReader);
 reader.read();
 SWFDocument doc             = docReader.getDocument();
